LanguageData.BuildPlasmaPrecision.label: 制造 C2 离子精确步枪
LanguageData.BuildPlasmaPrecision.description: Builds a C2 Plasma Precision Rifle. It is a highly accurate plasma sniper rifle with a low rate of fire. Fires a 2 round burst. This weapon does not need to be reloaded. Targets hit by the beam can catch on fire。
LanguageData.BuildPlasmaCarbine.label: 制造 C3 离子卡宾枪
LanguageData.BuildPlasmaCarbine.description: Builds the C3 Plasma Carbine, a short range, light-weight plasma rifle. Fires a 3 round burst. This weapon does not need to be reloaded. Targets hit by the plasma can catch on fire。
LanguageData.BuildPlasmaRifle.label: 制造 C7 离子步枪
LanguageData.BuildPlasmaRifle.description: Builds the C7 Multi-Plasma Rifle, a weapon with good stopping power and range. Fires a 7 round burst. This weapon does not need to be reloaded. Targets hit by the plasma can catch on fire。
